title: Welcome Email
goal: Welcome new subscribers and set expectations
subject: Welcome to {{company_name}}, {{first_name}}!
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

Welcome to {{company_name}}! We're thrilled to have you join our community.

Here's what you can expect from us:
• Weekly tips and insights
• Exclusive offers just for subscribers
• First access to our latest products

To get started, here's a special welcome gift: [LINK]

If you have any questions, just reply to this email.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}

P.S. Make sure to add our email to your contacts so you never miss an update!

title: Nurture Email #1 - Value Introduction
goal: Provide immediate value and build trust
subject: Here's your first exclusive tip, {{first_name}}
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

I hope you're settling in well! As promised, here's your first exclusive tip:

[MAIN TIP/VALUE CONTENT]

This simple strategy has helped thousands of our subscribers achieve [SPECIFIC RESULT].

Try it out and let me know how it goes - I read every reply!

More valuable content coming your way soon.

Best,
{{sender_name}}

P.S. Have a specific question? Just hit reply - I love hearing from our community!

title: Nurture Email #2 - Social Proof
goal: Build credibility through social proof and testimonials
subject: {{first_name}}, see what others are saying...
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

I wanted to share something exciting with you.

Just yesterday, I received this message from {{customer_name}}:

"[TESTIMONIAL CONTENT]"

This is exactly why I'm so passionate about what we do here at {{company_name}}.

Results like this aren't uncommon. Here are a few more quick wins from our community:

• [SUCCESS STORY 1]
• [SUCCESS STORY 2]
• [SUCCESS STORY 3]

Your success story could be next!

Cheering you on,
{{sender_name}}

title: Nurture Email #3 - Educational Content
goal: Provide educational value and position as expert
subject: The #1 mistake I see people make...
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

After helping thousands of people, I've noticed one mistake that comes up again and again:

[COMMON MISTAKE]

Here's why this happens and how to avoid it:

[EXPLANATION AND SOLUTION]

The good news? Once you know about this, it's easy to avoid.

Here's a quick checklist to make sure you're on the right track:

✓ [CHECKPOINT 1]
✓ [CHECKPOINT 2]
✓ [CHECKPOINT 3]

Remember, small improvements lead to big results over time.

Keep moving forward!
{{sender_name}}

title: Nurture Email #4 - Behind the Scenes
subject: {{first_name}}, here's my story...
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

I wanted to take a moment to share my story with you.

[PERSONAL BACKSTORY - STRUGGLE]

That's when I discovered [SOLUTION/METHOD].

Fast forward to today:
[CURRENT SUCCESS/RESULTS]

I'm sharing this because I know many of you are facing similar challenges.

The truth is, success isn't about being perfect. It's about:

• Taking consistent action
• Learning from setbacks
• Never giving up on your goals

I believe in you, {{first_name}}. You've got this!

Your friend,
{{sender_name}}

P.S. What's your biggest challenge right now? Hit reply and let me know - I read every email!

title: Re-engagement Email
when_to_send: When subscriber hasn't opened emails in 30+ days
subject: {{first_name}}, I miss you...
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

I noticed you haven't been opening my emails lately.

I get it - inboxes get overwhelming, and priorities change.

But before you go, I wanted to ask:

What would make my emails more valuable to you?

• More practical tips?
• Behind-the-scenes content?
• Case studies and examples?
• Something else entirely?

Just hit reply and let me know, or click here to update your preferences: [PREFERENCES LINK]

If you're ready to part ways, I understand. You can unsubscribe here: [UNSUBSCRIBE LINK]

No hard feelings - I only want to send emails you find valuable.

Hoping to earn back your attention,
{{sender_name}}

body:

title: Testimonial Request Email
when_to_send: After positive customer interaction or milestone
subject: Quick favor, {{first_name}}?
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

I hope you're loving [PRODUCT/SERVICE]!

I have a quick favor to ask.

Would you mind sharing a brief testimonial about your experience?

It would mean the world to me and help other people discover how [PRODUCT/SERVICE] can help them too.

Just reply to this email with:

• What challenge were you facing?
• How has [PRODUCT/SERVICE] helped?
• What would you tell someone considering it?

I'll take care of the rest!

If you're happy to share, I might feature your testimonial on our website and in future emails (with your permission, of course).

Thanks so much for considering it!

{{sender_name}}

P.S. If you're not completely satisfied, please let me know how I can make it right!

title: Abandoned Lead Follow-up
goal: Re-engage leads who didn't complete signup/purchase
when_to_send: When someone starts but doesn't complete a process
subject: Did you forget something, {{first_name}}?
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

I noticed you were checking out [PRODUCT/SERVICE] earlier but didn't complete your order.

No worries - it happens to the best of us!

I wanted to make sure you didn't run into any technical issues.

Your cart is still saved with:
[CART CONTENTS]

Total: ${{total}}

[COMPLETE ORDER BUTTON]

If you have any questions or concerns, just reply to this email.

I'm here to help!

Also, if you're on the fence, here's what recent customers are saying:

"[TESTIMONIAL]"

- {{customer_name}}

Ready to join them?

{{sender_name}}

P.S. This cart will expire in 24 hours, so don't wait too long!

title: Thank You & Referral Email
when_to_send: After purchase completion or milestone achievement
subject: Thank you, {{first_name}}! + A special request...
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

Thank you so much for your recent purchase of [PRODUCT/SERVICE]!

I'm genuinely excited for you to dive in and see the results.

If you have any questions as you get started, just reply to this email. I'm here to help!

Now, I have a small favor to ask...

If you know anyone who might benefit from [PRODUCT/SERVICE], would you mind sharing it with them?

As a thank you, I'll give you [REFERRAL REWARD] for each person who purchases using your link:

[REFERRAL LINK]

Your friends get [FRIEND BENEFIT], and you get [YOUR BENEFIT].

Everyone wins! 

Thanks again for your trust and support.

{{sender_name}}

P.S. Don't forget to join our private community where you can ask questions and share wins: [COMMUNITY LINK]
